Creo que al día de hoy puedo recomendar completamente el juego. Es entretenido y adictivo. Los personajes gratuitos son más que suficiente para disfrutar completamente de la experiencia del juego. Entre las misiones diarias, los eventos, los logros, los archivos y el pase, siempre vas a entrar a las partidas con objetivos personales y siempre tendrás una excusa para usar todos los personajes de los que dispongas. El juego es entretenido ya sea que juegues solo o con amigos. La comunidad es muy apasionada al igual que los desarrolladores que mejoran el juego constantemente (servidores dedicados, mejoras gráficas, eventos especiales, reworks, updates, bug fixing, contenido nuevo). 
En fin voy a decir lo que la mayoría de la gente quiere saber cuando lee una reseña, el juego no es pay to win bajo ningún concepto y las cientos de  horas de entretenimiento que le vas a sacar al juego superan con creces el costo del mismo. Dead by Daylight esta en su mejor momento y solo se va a poner mejor en el futuro próximo.

Dead by Daylight is an amazing game!

The difficulty curve is pretty high I'd say. When you're completely new to the game, you are undeniably at the mercy of the killer and even the other survivors. Whether the killer and survivor are nice to you because you're new is completely up to them. You won't know what to do - other than fixing generators - and the nuances of the game will be completely lost on you. What are totems? What are hexes? What are perks, keys, maps?

You might be tempted to quit. A lot of people do. But if you stick around it becomes so much more rewarding. Spend time spectating, watching let's plays, practicing in trials, and soon enough you'll have enough hang of the game to escape a trial. There is nothing more satisfying than escaping the killer due to your own merit for the first time.

The concept of the game as a whole is frankly amazing. The fact that they managed to get so many licensed killers in the game - Michael Myers, Leatherface, Pyramid Head, and even the Demogorgon to name a few - just speaks to how amazing this game is. If you're a horror connoisseur or even just an enthusiast like me, you'll love this game!

And there's tons of customizations for the survivors too, if that's your thing. You can wear dark clothing to blend in, or you can just wear completely bright clothing if you're confident in your ability to make the killer feel like a fool. You can buy them, and special customizations can be unlocked from doing Rift challenges, which give you an overarching goal as opposed to simply escaping. Some of them even look pretty cool!

Anyways, I can't speak highly enough of this game. I've picked it up and dropped it multiple times over, but I just keep coming back to it! Thanks Behavior, for an amazing game!

Además de que asegura muchas horas de juego y de perfeccionamiento individual. Muy recomendable por ello y por sus mecánicas

I have been playing for a bit more than 500 hours and can say that this game has the most toxic community ever existed. Besides from the constantly face-camping killers, there is a lot of survivors who are ruining the overall game experience by cooperating with the killers or selling themselves and leaving two or one survivor left to do 5 gens, or fight for the hatch against the killer. The problem is also that the reports don't basically do anything. 
The events is the second thing that pisses me off. For example the current event dedicated to the 4th anniversary could have been a better idea, if only the community was more friendly. At the moment it is just impossible to get the event reward - the crown - without killing your last brain cells and the nerves. I just finished a game, where two guys sold themselves and I was left with a Feng to do 4 gens,  which I fixed. So there was only 1 gen left and I saw that Feng was chased and it was her last time, so I just decided to go and search for the hatch. After a while, I've realised that they were farming and decided to finish the last gen. But I got caught with the help of that Feng, so she was the only one to survive. After the match, in the chat section I decided to write my honest opinion on this game and received: 
ScoopsAhoy(the killer): 
"You are a hatch camping shit, but Feng was nice" 

The funniest fact was that I didn't even know where the hatch was, so there is no opoortunity I would be camping it. And that Feng was doing basically nothing.  It's simply unfair how does the people who do the most of the work are suffering just because the killer mistook them for another. 

So, to sum up: this game could have been better, if there was more strict rules regarding the community and behaving. The reports don't do anything at all and those jerks keep ruining the game experience for everyone.

从寂静岭DLC入坑的黎明杀机。
[h1] 联想ideapad 300，酷睿i5+4G+AMD集显超低配电脑[/h1]改画质文件 终于玩上了，[h1]极限46fps，稳定31fps [/h1]
新手安装体验不是很好，[h1]一开始提示驱动签名问题，后面进游戏提示EAC无法实体化、初始化失败一大堆问题，折腾一个下午才好 [/h1]
近年来黎明杀机一直在疯狂联动：寂静岭、猛鬼街、人皮脸、仇恨之链、怪奇物语、电锯惊魂（）、求生之路、被诅咒的遗产、信徒的死亡、黑暗渗透、断绝血脉......惊喜很多
吐槽一下服装和匹配系统，[h1]萌新屠夫匹配了半小时没人，服装传说品质清一色发光闪亮亮的，想不被发现都难 [/h1]
xsnmm

Dead by Daylight Сочно вонзив мачете в плоть жертвы, маньяк обязательно остановится и вытрет инструмент о рукав, давая раненому герою небольшую фору. К тому же одного удара всегда мало. Убийца очень медленно протискивается в оконные проемы и долго разламывает сооруженные выжившими препятствия — чтобы жертва получила еще один шанс и игра в кошки-мышки растянулась. Dead by Daylight одинаково хорошо заставляет игрока чувствовать себя и испуганной жертвой, и хладнокровным охотником. Хотя правильнее будет сказать — «заставляла». Когда только вышла и первые, совсем еще неопытные, убийцы и жертвы зашли в игру. Теперь же бал правят холодный расчет и беспардонное использование багов и дыр в балансе. И пути назад, кажется, уже нет.

Maybe if there was a system in place for tunneling or campers (which is about 85% of the killer community) then this game might have a chance to be fun.  i only play to play with friends, but we spend most of the time complaining about all the bugs. Killers should not be able to hit you through the walls and some perks like the "jump scare myers build?" or whatever its called should be illegal and those perks need to be toned down a lot.

That being said I have also experienced really great teamwork when playing solo, as well as killers that will let you live cause they actually want people to be happy when they play. Id give this game a 2 of 5 stars for the few that make this game great.
